zh.restricted: 用户有恶意请求的嫌疑
zh.has_too_many_loan: 同一个用户同一时间不能有多个正在申请贷款
zh.unfinished_loan_existed: 存在未完成的贷款计划
zh.mortgage_value_less_than_sell_line: 抵押资产价格低于强平线
zh.loan_amount_less_than_min: 贷款金额小于最小可贷金额
zh.loan_amount_great_than_max: 贷款金额大于最大可贷金额
zh.exceed_user_max_loan_num: 超过用户最大在贷笔数
zh.exceed_user_max_loan_amount_num: 超过过用户最大在贷金额
zh.c2c_balance_not_enough: C2C兑换账户池未锁定余额不足
zh.loan_plan_info_is_null: 未获取到需要补仓的相应贷款计划信息
zh.repayment_request_is_null: 申请还款请求参数为空
zh.order_is_already_loan: 订单已开始放款，请联系客服取消订单
zh.please_input_loan_plan_no_or_repayment_c: 请输入贷款计划编号或者还款码
zh.query_repayment_order_failed: 查询还款单状态信息失败
zh.repayment_order_already_exsits: 存在正在进行中的还款单
zh.loan_amount_and_mortgage_amount_is_null: 贷款金额和抵押金额不能同时为空
zh.get_price_error: 无法获取抵押资产当前的价格
zh.cfg_handle_rule_management_null: 未获取到处置规则信息
zh.loan_amount_not_equal_now_loan_amount: 贷款金额与当前计算的贷款金额不等

en.resend_vcode: no request sent to send verification code
en.phone_already_register: The mobile number has been registered
en.invalid_password: Password does not meet the requirements
en.missing_field: The marked field cannot be empty
en.the_time_zone_in_the_area_is_not_configu: This time zone is not configured
en.regional_time_zone_does_not_match: This time zone does not match
en.cannot_change_card_during_loan_disposal: Card change not permitted during loan application
en.has_too_many_loan: Multiple loan applications by the same user at the same time are not permitted
en.user_has_not_kyc: No KYC certification of the user
en.mortgage_value_less_than_sell_line: Mortgage asset price below forced liquidation floor
en.loan_amount_less_than_min: Loan amount under the minimum loanable amount
en.loan_amount_great_than_max: Loan amount above the maximum loanable amount
en.exceed_user_max_loan_num: Over the user's maximum ongoing loan time
en.exceed_user_max_loan_amount_num: Over the user's maximum ongoing loan amount
en.c2c_balance_not_enough: insufficient unlocked balance in the C2C exchange account pool
en.loan_plan_no_is_null: Loan plan number cannot be empty
en.loan_plan_info_is_null: No loan plan information for required replenishment
en.repayment_request_is_null: Repayment application request parameter is empty
en.order_is_already_loan: Start to grant the loan upon the order, contact customer service to cancel the order
en.please_input_loan_plan_no_or_repayment_c: Please enter the loan plan number or repayment code
en.repayment_order_already_exsits: There is an ongoing repayment order
en.loan_amount_and_mortgage_amount_is_null: The loan amount and the mortgage amount cannot be empty at the same time.
en.get_price_error: Unable to get the current price of the mortgaged asset
en.loan_amount_not_equal_now_loan_amount: Loaning amount different from the currently calculated loan amount
en.apply_loan_repayment_mode_value: One-off repayment of principal and interest
